Value: Agreement on a detailed list of requirements for software with the customer
Inclusion of the agreed list of requirements for software from the customer into the contract
Precise adherence to customer requirements from the agreed list of requirements for software
Expert evaluation of the software project by an experienced third-party consultant
Consultations with an experienced third-party consultant
Training on the use of necessary software development tools
Use of 'template' solutions from successful previous projects in project management
Preparation of documents demonstrating the importance of this project for achieving the financial goals of the development company
Reorganization of the work of the project team so that responsibilities and work of team members overlap
Acquisition (ordering) of components of the developed software
Replacement of potentially defective components of the developed software with purchased components that guarantee the quality of work
Acquisition of a more productive database
Reorganization of the work of the project team depending on the level of difficulty in completing tasks and the professional levels of developers
Reuse of suitable software components that were developed for other software projects
Analysis of the feasibility of developing this software
